comments.body:
Add comment that license file is manually packaged:

```
# License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/karimbahgat/Pyqtree/pull/20
license_file: LICENSE
...
```

This will be a reminder to check future releases to see if the license file has been included in the source distribution, at which point you can delete the manually included copy. Please note though that upstream currently, the license file is `license.txt`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@  license: MIT
  # License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/karimbahgat/Pyqtree/pull/20
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
